name: EUSOCIAL
description: Eusocial Weapons or Systems can be used by adjacent allied characters as if they were equipped by that allied character, as long as the weapon or system is intact. If a system causes a Save, it uses the donor’s Save Target instead of the user’s. If a system has a continuous effect, it is removed once adjacency is broken. Core Powers, Core Bonuses, and Talents are treated as normal.

name: HIVEMIND
description: HiveMind systems utilize a local sensor network to provide increased efficiency and coordination. You can use an Ally's line of sight and sensor range when using a Hivemind system, as long as they are within your line of sight and sensors. This property ceases to function while you are Jammed.
